name: mingling-fast
description: AI 캐릭터 채팅 모바일 웹 애플리케이션

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push

author: Mingling Team
